actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to require the President to impose mandatory price and allocation controls on middle distillate fuels, to provide that removal of such controls be subject to Congressional review, and for other purposes.
short_title: Middle Distillate Fuel Control Act of 1979

summary.text: Middle Distillate Fuel Control Act of 1979 - Directs the President to issue regulations under authority of the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973 providing for the mandatory allocation of middle distillate fuels at prices specified in such regulation. Subjects amendments to such regulations to congressional review.

titles.title: Middle Distillate Fuel Control Act of 1979

A bill to require the President to impose mandatory price and allocation controls on middle distillate fuels, to provide that removal of such controls be subject to Congressional review, and for other purposes.
